article_title: Providence forum seeks remedies for soaring health-care costs
article_text:
Providence forum seeks remedies for soaring health-care costs

The chart on the screen said it all. Dots representing a slew of Asian and European countries indicated their citizens had life expectancies of greater than 80 years for about $2,000 to $5,000 in health-care...
